com.faanggang.wisetrack.controllers

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faanggang.wisetrack.controllers.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    UserManager accesses cloud firebase to retrieve or store new/updated user info data

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserManager(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addExperimentReference(java.lang.String uid, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference experimentReference)
      Stores experiment document from cloud firebase to the user document that created it
      void addUser(java.lang.String uid, java.lang.String username)
      adds a user into cloud firebase
      void createNewUser(UserManager userManager, java.lang.String username)
      This is a method which signs a new user in using Firebase Authentication and calls UserManager class to store default user information into cloud database
      void getUserInfo(java.lang.String uid, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> callback)
      get a users information from cloud firebase
      void storeCurrentUser(java.lang.String uid, UserManager userManager)
      This method retrieves current user info from database using UserManager and stores it into a WiseTrackApplication singleton class
      void updateCurrentUser(java.lang.String uid)
      updates edited user info

        public void getUserInfo(java.lang.String uid,
                        com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> callback)
        get a users information from cloud firebase
        Parameters:
        uid - uid is the userID of the user we can retrieving
        callback - callback is the OnCompleteListener object which has the OnComplete method

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String uid,
                    java.lang.String username)
        adds a user into cloud firebase
        Parameters:
        uid - userID of the new User
        username - unique username entered by the user

      • updateCurrentUser

        public void updateCurrentUser(java.lang.String uid)

        Parameters:

      • addExperimentReference

        public void addExperimentReference(java.lang.String uid,
                                   com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference experimentReference)
        Stores experiment document from cloud firebase to the user document that created it
        Parameters:
        uid - userID of user
        experimentReference - experiment document on cloud firebase for that experiment

      • createNewUser

        public void createNewUser(UserManager userManager,
                          java.lang.String username)
        This is a method which signs a new user in using Firebase Authentication and calls UserManager class to store default user information into cloud database
